name: MAS FINANCE
description: MAS Finance is a decentralized Token built on the polygon network that offers a modularized and modern way to give benefit to all Involved users. Its aims to bring businesses and developers together to solve real world problems. The MAS Finance team works around the clock to keep MAS Finance functional and 100% bug free, we use blockchain technology to run all the processing works, which Ensures 0% chances of Errors.Blockchain is said to be known as the best ever decentralized technology.
